articles.author: BEN FINLEY
articles.title: How O.J. Simpson burned the Ford Bronco into America's collective memory - The Associated Press
articles.description: O.J. Simpson has died. But his time in a white Ford Bronco during a slow-moving police pursuit on the Los Angeles freeways 30 years ago still burns bright in the nation’s cultural memory. The Bronco — or at least that Bronco — has become one of America’s most…
articles.content:
The Ford Bronco initially was conceived and designed for rugged outdoorsy types, a two-door means of escape to nature from the bustling cities of mid-century America. 
But it had already been tamed … [+5803 chars]
